attributes.action: International student with long residency be allowed student finance
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is in high demand of nurses and this covers all forms of nurses. I personally think there’s a higher demand in the mental health sector this is due to past experiences. I personally suffer from anxiety and depression with ptsd I had to wait for a long time before I can get any form of support and this is due to staff shortage and a high demand sector.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to allow student classified as international student With long residency on private life basis be entitled to student finance
